The poets complaint a poem : to which is added The character of poetry, written in prose. T. W.
[4], 20 p.
Printed for D. Brown ..., London : 1682.
In verse. Dedication signed: T.W. "In part the same as Poeta de tristibus, or, The Poet's complaint" (Wing P2727)--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
